title: ⭐ CHALLENGE: Async MMO Server
subtitle: Build High-Performance Async System
description:
# Build Async MMO Server!

⚡ **Build a concurrent MMO server** handling multiple players.

## Requirements

- Async player connection handling
- Concurrent combat resolution
- Async database operations
- Task scheduling
- Performance monitoring

*Hint: Use asyncio.create_task for background tasks.*
starterCode:
import asyncio

print('Build your async MMO server!')
print('Requirements:')
print('1. Async player handlers')
print('2. Concurrent combat')
print('3. Async database')
print('4. Task scheduling')
print('Good luck!')

commonMistakes.explanation: Never use time.sleep() in async code. Use await asyncio.sleep().

bonus.description: Add WebSocket support for real-time communication
